did.head: Descriptive Summary

did.physloc: Located in locked compact shelving, Level 1, Shelf 23-B.
did.abstract: This collection contains a scrapbook from Lucy Gay Johnston's Radford College days, as well as various pamphlets, newspaper clippings, programs, photographs, and other memorabilia from Giles County. See the finding aid for more details.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Lucy Gay Johnston attended Radford College from 1934-1936, and later lived in Giles County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Lucy Gay Johnston Collection contains various clippings and papers from her time at Radford College, a sampling of which are her diploma from 1936, her student handbook dated 1935-1940, and her program from her commencement graduation in 1938. Articles from this collection also include various papers from Giles County such as a Giles County School handbook for the 1972-1973 school year, and Telephone Directories for the year 1964 for New Castle and the town of Pembrook in 1993. Photographs are also included in this collection some of which are labeled Old House Photos. This collection also includes two scrapbooks created by Mrs. Johnston which are entitled The Graduate's Happy Days, and My Memory Book.
